page.title: 15ANIMALS,PLANTS AND BIRDS
page.content: The{Hen Harrier}(Gos-Haak) is quite a rare bird in the country.Orkney is one of the only places in Britain which still has them breeding .The{Peregrine {Falcon}is also a rare bird that in Orkney. Here are some birds names : {shelduck(sly goose),Fulmar(mallimack) and{Eider duck(dunter). The{Orkney Vole}is only found in Orkney .There is a theory that when Orkney was joined to Britain the vole lived there but it is extinct in Mainland Britain now. The most special,beautiful and famous Orkney flower is the{Primula scotica. It is a wonderful tiny flower with its purple petals and yellow centre.It grows on the west coast of Orkney near the sea .Other Orkney specialities are {fuchsia and Scottish lupins. Orkney also has{grey and common {seals.
